name: ACM-ICMLC 2018 10th Int. Conference on Machine Learning and Computing_Ei,Scopus
content: 2018 10th International Conference on Machine Learning and Computing (ICMLC 2018) will be held February 26-28, 2018 in University of Macau, China. The conference is sposored by #University of Macau, China#. \*\* Paper Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into #ACM conference proceedings#, indexed by \*\*Ei Compendex\*\*,\*\*Scopus\*\* . \*\* Contact us: Ms. Caroline Miu, Conference Secretary E-mail: icmlc@asr.org. +1-617-229-6820
